author: PersonalAd3618
comment: UPDATE ON THIS POST:The football cca staff advisor emailed me and said that i need experience to join,this is his full email sent to me Thank you for your interest in TP Soccer CCA! Our soccer CCA is a competitive sports team. To maintain our competitive edge, we are looking for players with prior experience in competitive soccer. If you have competitive soccer experience, we'd love to learn more about your background and explore how you could contribute to our team. If you are still building your experience, we encourage you to keep honing your skills and consider joining us in the future. Hope this information is useful to you.
